title: description
A prima mix between the B.V.D. and the Fairbanks Cocktail. As prima as Mike Posner's steps.

title: notes
Daiquiri, Rum and a dash of feel.

title: pairing
Mike Posner has it with a bored Cocktail Sauce and mille-feuille.

title: serving_suggestion
Shake with ice and strain. Drink to the prima sounds of Cooler Than Me.
